content.en: Cloud intrusion detection: Researchers have been investigating various algorithms to improve intrusion detection systems in cloud computing. These algorithms include k-means clustering, fuzzy C mean clustering, fuzzy self-classifying clustering, and hybrid classification models. By combining these algorithms with techniques such as anomaly detection, artificial neural networks, support vector machines, and fuzzy logic, researchers aim to enhance the accuracy and effectiveness of intrusion detection in cloud environments.
content.da: Cloud-indtrængningsdetektion: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre indtrængningsdetektionssystemer i cloud computing. Disse algoritmer omfatter k-means clustering, fuzzy C mean clustering, fuzzy selvklassificerende clustering og hybride klassifikationsmodeller. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer med teknikker som anomali-detektion, kunstige neurale netværk, support vector maskiner og fuzzy logik, sigter forskerne mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af indtrængningsdetektering i cloud-miljøer.
